    #include <stdio.h>
    long long T,A,B,C,N,i,j,ans;
    int min(int x,int y){return x<y?x:y;}
    int main()
    {
    scanf("%lld",&T);
    while (T--)
    {
    scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld",&N,&A,&B,&C);
    ans=0;
    for (i=0;i<=A && i<=N;i++)
    for (j=0;j<=B && j<=N-i;j++)
    ans+=1+min(C,N-i-j);
    printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
    }
